name: Ship should be clean now
desc: You've killed all creatures on the ship, go tell Madelyn about it.
short: Kill every monster on the ship

dialog.answer:
Good, I'll tell the client about it.
You did well, here is Your split as a reward.
Whenever You want to do something, just have a look at the blackboard to Your left, there You will find missions that I can give You.
better rewards obvbiously will meen harder missions, keep that in mind.
